name: Eruption
description: Summon a scorching cloud of ash at the target location, dealing 1799 Flame Damage immediately, reducing enemy Movement Speed by 70%, and dealing 449 Flame Damage in the area every 1 second for 15 seconds.  The eruptive damage can occur once every 10 seconds.
effectLines: Damages instead of healing. Deals some damage instantly.
coefDescription: Summon a scorching cloud of ash at the target location, dealing $1 Flame Damage immediately, reducing enemy Movement Speed by 70%, and dealing $2 Flame Damage in the area every 1 second for 15 seconds.  The eruptive damage can occur once every 10 seconds.
